title: Autonomous Firefighting Drone
shortDesc: A quadcopter that autonomously detects and extinguishes fires.
description: Our flagship project: a quadcopter equipped with thermal cameras and a ball-drop extinguishing mechanism. It can autonomously navigate to fire sources and deploy fire suppression agents.

title: Smart Greenhouse System
shortDesc: IoT-based automated greenhouse monitoring and control.
description: An automated greenhouse system that monitors temperature, humidity, soil moisture, and light levels. It automatically controls irrigation, ventilation, and lighting for optimal plant growth.

title: Line Following Robot
description: A classic robotics project that teaches fundamental concepts of sensors, motors, and control algorithms. Built as part of our beginner workshop series.

title: Offline Voice Assistant
shortDesc: A privacy-focused voice assistant that runs entirely offline.
description: An IoT device that processes voice commands locally without sending data to the cloud. Perfect for smart home automation with privacy in mind.
